OUTLINE : This randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind study . Patients stratify accord phase menstrual cycle time biopsy time surgery ( follicular phase [ i.e. , first 7 day menstrual cycle ] v luteal phase [ i.e. , day 7 menstrual cycle ] ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral soy protein isolate twice daily oral multivitamin daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oral placebo twice daily oral multivitamin daily . In arm , treatment continue 2-4 week depend time study entry plan surgical procedure . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 106 patient ( 53 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 18 month .
